title: Single Sign-On
description: Configure SAML Single Sign-On (SSO) for your team
statusEnabledDescription: SAML SSO is enabled for your team. Users can sign in using your identity provider.
statusDisabledDescription: SAML SSO is not configured. Configure SSO to allow users to sign in using your identity provider.
enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in using your identity provider
idpMetadataPlaceholder: Paste your IdP metadata XML here
idpMetadataDescription: You can usually find this in your IdP's SAML configuration or download it as a file
certificatePlaceholder: Paste your IdP's X.509 certificate here
